function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 with millions infected from over 185 countries/regions.","Impact":"Severe strain on healthcare systems, high mortality rate, and economic disruption.","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, increase healthcare capacity, and develop effective vaccines and treatments.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telemedicine, and vaccine development technologies.","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals.","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments, and healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"High mortality rate with over 200,000 deceased from COVID-19.","Impact":"Loss of lives, grief and trauma for families, and social disruption.","Mitigation":"Strict public health measures, access to quality healthcare, and development of effective treatments and vaccines.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote patient monitoring, and vaccine development technologies.","People":"Families of the deceased, at-risk populations, and communities.","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations, and research institutions."}]}
